fields.description: Client name.
fields.name: __client_name

fields.description: Source name.
fields.name: __source_name

fields.description: Schema version.
fields.name: __schema_version

fields.description: Event timestamp.
fields.name: __event_timestamp

fields.description: List of all barcodes, which can be applied for the exact product
fields.name: barcodes

fields.description: Product case unit gross weight
fields.name: weight

fields.description: Unit in which product case's size is weighted
fields.name: unit_of_measure

fields.description: Product case unit height
fields.name: height

fields.description: Product case unit width
fields.name: width

fields.description: Product unit length
fields.name: length

fields.description: Unit in which cases's size is measured
fields.name: unit_of_measure

fields.description: Number of product units in the product case (boxcase)
fields.name: case_count

fields.description: Name of category in Retailer's system
fields.name: name

fields.description: Id of a product category in Retailer's system
fields.name: id

fields.description: Corp-id is the ID used by retailer for their supply chain management operations
fields.name: corp_ids

fields.description: Date and time of the product creation. One time action - date provided during first iteration
fields.name: created_ts

fields.description: Detailed, human_readable description of the e-commerce product to display on CUI
fields.name: description

fields.description: Ecom-id is used by retailer to identify a product entity selectable by customers in shopping applications
fields.name: ecom_ids

fields.description: Technical field in RINT API
fields.name: extra

fields.description: Bulk items are not pushed into OSR
fields.name: is_bulk

fields.description: Everything that will lose the form and structure when placed under heavy products
fields.name: is_crushable

fields.description: Hazardous are items that can become an operations or safety risk if stored in the OSR
fields.name: is_hazardous

fields.description: Everything that will crush other products and can't be stacked
fields.name: is_heavy

fields.description: `Raw` is used for items that should be stored at the lowest level of the OSR chilled section
fields.name: is_raw

fields.description: Designation of CHEM and FOOD items
fields.name: is_chemical

fields.description: Mid-temperature chilled area (~45-50F instead of 35F)
fields.name: is_specific_chilled

fields.description: Fragile items
fields.name: is_glass_packaged

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item requires strictly vertical storage
fields.name: is_vertical

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item can be placed on top of another item
fields.name: is_stackable

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item has to be stored by cases only
fields.name: is_case_storage

fields.description: Some items require additional bagging at the picking station
fields.name: is_requires_plastic_bag

fields.description: Link to the product's image. CDN retailer_hosted version of the item image
fields.name: image

fields.description: 'po' means Purchase Order. Indicates if product can be replenished (purchased) by weight or by piece (each)
fields.name: is_weight_variable_on_po

fields.description: Indicates if the product is sold from the shop by weight or by piece (each)
fields.name: is_weight_variable_on_receipt

fields.description: Indicates if the product is sold on the website by weight or by piece (each)
fields.name: is_weight_variable_on_webcart

fields.description: Last modified date and time
fields.name: last_modified_ts

fields.description: Consists of additional links between current tom_id and other tom_ids within the assortment that can be used as possible substitutions we can allow during the MFC fulfillment process
fields.name: linked_tom_ids

fields.description: The specified area on the shop floor, not MFC
fields.name: area

fields.description: Specified aisle on the shop floor, not MFC
fields.name: aisle

fields.description: Specified bay on the shop floor, not MFC
fields.name: bay

fields.description: The specified shelf on the shop floor, not MFC
fields.name: shelf

fields.description: A specified position on the shelf in the shop floor, not MFC
fields.name: position

fields.description: Product storage
fields.name: item_type

fields.description: Shows if item is sold only in e-store
fields.name: ecom_only_item

fields.description: Identify if the product can be purchased for MFC
fields.name: mfc_stop_buy

fields.description: Identify that the product can't be picked for customer order even if it has positive stock
fields.name: mfc_stop_fulfill

fields.description: Corp-id is the ID used by retailer for their supply chain management operations. refer to corp-ids attribute
fields.name: primary_corp_id

fields.description: Retailer-specific store_id represents MFC as a store location, this attribute is important in resolving location_specific parameters
fields.name: store_id

fields.description: Retailer-specific supplier id.
fields.name: supplier_id

fields.description: Retailer-specific supplier name.
fields.name: supplier_name

fields.description: Sub-account code of supplier.
fields.name: supplier_sub_account

fields.description: Type of supplier: `DC`, `DSD`, `Orderable DSD`.
fields.name: supplier_type

fields.description: Supplier-specific product id.
fields.name: supplier_product_id

fields.description: Identify if the product can be purchased from the supplier.
fields.name: supplier_keep_buy

fields.description: Total lead time in days.
fields.name: supplier_perform_cycle

fields.description: Product description
fields.name: media

fields.description: Image view designation
fields.name: view

fields.description: The URL to a CDN retailer_hosted version of the item image
fields.name: url

fields.description: Product description
fields.name: name

fields.description: If requires_expiration_date = true, then the decanting operator would be required to enter the expiration date
fields.name: requires_expiration_date

fields.description: Product unit gross weight
fields.name: weight

fields.description: Unit in which product item is weighted
fields.name: unit_of_measure

fields.description: Product unit height
fields.name: height

fields.description: Product unit width
fields.name: width

fields.description: Product unit length
fields.name: length

fields.description: Unit in which the product's size is measured
fields.name: unit_of_measure

fields.description: Record update counter. Through all the lines nextval('products_revision_seq')
fields.name: revision

fields.description: The recommended maximum time for which products or fresh (harvested) produce can be stored, during which the defined quality of a specified proportion of the goods remains acceptable under expected (or specified) conditions of distribution, storage and display
fields.name: shelf_life

fields.description: Temperature zone where products can be stored
fields.name: temperature_zone

fields.description: This is a primary key used to identify TOM product_item
fields.name: tom_id
